overview: Two high-maintenance, big city hunks - British superstar Josh Moore and East Coast fan-favorite Calvin Banks - leave behind the comforts of their glamorous porn star lives and head off to rural America for a taste of The Gay Simple Life. Given little information other than to "be prepared for an adventure" by acclaimed director mr. Pam, Josh and Calvin are dropped smack dab in the middle of America... Tulsa, Oklahoma
title: The Gay Simple Life
